_GEng_Sprite_PointGet.documentation: Returns the word's relatvie position of a sprite's relative point
_GEng_Sprite_PointGet.label: _GEng_Sprite_PointGet(ByRef $hSprite, $iImgX, $iImgY, ByRef $x, ByRef $y)

params.label: $x
params.documentation: Vars that will contain the word's relative position

params.label: $y
params.documentation: Vars that will contain the word's relative position

_GEng_PointToPoint_Vector.documentation: Returns a vector oriented from the first point to the second
_GEng_PointToPoint_Vector.label: _GEng_PointToPoint_Vector($x0, $y0, $x, $y, $iGrandeur = Default)

params.label: $iGrandeur
params.documentation:
Lenght of the vector
(If Default, then the distance between the 2 points is taken as lenght)

_GEng_SpriteToPoint_Dist.documentation: Returns the distance between a Sprite Object and a point
_GEng_SpriteToPoint_Dist.label: _GEng_SpriteToPoint_Dist(ByRef $hSprite, $x, $y)

_GEng_SpriteToPoint_Angle.documentation: Returns the angle between a Sprite Object and a point
_GEng_SpriteToPoint_Angle.label: _GEng_SpriteToPoint_Angle(ByRef $hSprite, $x, $y)

_GEng_SpriteToPoint_AngleDiff.documentation:
Returns the angle between a Sprite Object and a point,
relativelly to the actual angle of the Sprite Object
_GEng_SpriteToPoint_AngleDiff.label: _GEng_SpriteToPoint_AngleDiff(ByRef $hSprite, $x, $y)

_GEng_SpriteToPoint_Vector.documentation: Returns a vector oriented from a Sprite Object to a point
_GEng_SpriteToPoint_Vector.label: _GEng_SpriteToPoint_Vector(ByRef $hSprite, $x, $y, $iGrandeur = Default)

params.label: $iGrandeur
params.documentation:
Lenght of the vector
(If Default, then the distance between the Sprite Object and the points is taken as lenght)

_GEng_SpriteToSprite_Dist.documentation: Returns the distance between 2 Sprite Objects
_GEng_SpriteToSprite_Dist.label: _GEng_SpriteToSprite_Dist(ByRef $hSprite, ByRef $hSprite2)

_GEng_SpriteToSprite_Angle.documentation: Returns the angle from the first Sprite Object to the second
_GEng_SpriteToSprite_Angle.label: _GEng_SpriteToSprite_Angle(ByRef $hSprite, ByRef $hSprite2)

_GEng_SpriteToSprite_AngleDiff.documentation:
Returns the angle between a Sprite Object and another,
relativelly to the actual angle of the first Sprite Object
_GEng_SpriteToSprite_AngleDiff.label: _GEng_SpriteToSprite_AngleDiff(ByRef $hSprite, ByRef $hSprite2)

_GEng_SpriteToSprite_Vector.documentation: Returns a vector oriented from a Sprite Object to another
_GEng_SpriteToSprite_Vector.label: _GEng_SpriteToSprite_Vector(ByRef $hSprite, ByRef $hSprite2, $iGrandeur = Default)

params.label: $iGrandeur
params.documentation:
Lenght of the vector
(If Default, then the distance between the Sprite Objects is taken as lenght)

_GEng_AngleToVector.documentation: Returns a vector from an Angle and a Lenght
_GEng_AngleToVector.label: _GEng_AngleToVector($iAngle, $iGrandeur = 1)

_GEng_VectorToAngle.documentation: Returns an Angle from a Vector
_GEng_VectorToAngle.label: _GEng_VectorToAngle($difX, $difY)
